entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `username` TEXT NOT NULL, `email` TEXT NOT NULL, `passwordHash` TEXT NOT NULL, `fullName` TEXT NOT NULL, `role` TEXT NOT NULL, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `profileImageUrl` TEXT, `phoneNumber` TEXT, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastLoginAt` INTEGER, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `barcode` TEXT, `identifier` TEXT NOT NULL, `imageUrl` TEXT, `localImagePath` TEXT, `categoryId` TEXT, `subcategoryId` TEXT, `totalStock` INTEGER NOT NULL, `minStockAlert` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isStockAlertEnabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `salePrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `purchasePrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `supplierId` TEXT, `supplierName` TEXT, `quality` TEXT, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdBy` TEXT, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastSyncAt` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantType` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantLabel` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantValue` TEXT NOT NULL, `stock` INTEGER NOT NULL, `additionalPrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `imageUrl` TEXT, `localPath` TEXT, `isPrimary` INTEGER NOT NULL, `sortOrder` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `salePrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `purchasePrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `changedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `changedBy` TEXT, `reason` TEXT, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `parentId` TEXT, `iconName` TEXT, `colorHex` TEXT, `sortOrder` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `contactName` TEXT, `phone` TEXT, `email` TEXT, `address` TEXT, `city` TEXT, `notes` TEXT, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `productName` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantId` TEXT, `variantDescription` TEXT, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `unitPrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `discount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `subtotal` INTEGER NOT NULL, `imageUrl` TEXT, `addedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `addedBy` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `saleNumber` TEXT NOT NULL, `customerId` TEXT, `customerName` TEXT, `subtotal` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalDiscount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `taxAmount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `total` INTEGER NOT NULL, `paymentMethod` TEXT NOT NULL, `amountPaid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `changeAmount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `status` TEXT NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `soldBy` TEXT NOT NULL, `soldByName` TEXT NOT NULL, `soldAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `cancelledAt` INTEGER, `cancelledBy` TEXT, `cancellationReason` TEXT, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastSyncAt` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `saleId` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `productName` TEXT NOT NULL, `productIdentifier` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantId` TEXT, `variantDescription` TEXT, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `unitPrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `purchasePrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `discount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `subtotal` INTEGER NOT NULL, `productImageUrl` TEXT, `barcode` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`saleId`) REFERENCES `sales`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_sale_items_saleId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sale_items_saleId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`saleId`)

indices.name: index_sale_items_productId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sale_items_productId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`productId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantId` TEXT, `movementType` TEXT NOT NULL, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `previousStock` INTEGER NOT NULL, `newStock` INTEGER NOT NULL, `reason` TEXT, `referenceId` TEXT, `referenceType` TEXT, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdBy` TEXT NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `date` TEXT NOT NULL, `openingCash` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalSales` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalCashSales` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalCardSales` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalTransferSales` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalCreditSales` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalRefunds` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalExpenses` INTEGER NOT NULL, `closingCash` INTEGER NOT NULL, `expectedCash` INTEGER NOT NULL, `difference` INTEGER NOT NULL, `salesCount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `itemsSold` INTEGER NOT NULL, `profit` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isClosed` INTEGER NOT NULL, `closedAt` INTEGER, `closedBy` TEXT, `notes` TEXT, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, `amount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `category` TEXT, `paymentMethod` TEXT NOT NULL, `receiptImageUrl` TEXT, `date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdBy` TEXT NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `ruc` TEXT, `phone` TEXT, `email` TEXT, `address` TEXT, `city` TEXT, `notes` TEXT, `totalPurchases` INTEGER NOT NULL, `purchaseCount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastPurchaseAt` INTEGER, `creditLimit` INTEGER NOT NULL, `currentCredit` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncStatus` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `entityType` TEXT NOT NULL, `entityId` TEXT NOT NULL, `operation` TEXT NOT NULL, `status` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `syncedAt` INTEGER, `retryCount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `errorMessage` TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`key` TEXT NOT NULL, `value` TEXT NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`key`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `ruc` TEXT, `address` TEXT, `phone` TEXT, `email` TEXT, `logoUrl` TEXT, `currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `lowStockThreshold` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `productId` TEXT NOT NULL, `variantId` TEXT, `priceType` TEXT NOT NULL, `oldPrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `newPrice` INTEGER NOT NULL, `reason` TEXT, `changedBy` TEXT NOT NULL, `changedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))
